game.title: Find the Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of the pirate captain.
game.description: The pirate captain's treasure is said to be hidden on a remote island. The only clues to its whereabouts are in his journal, which you must find and decipher.
game.reward: The pirate captain's treasure, worth a fortune.

task.description: The pirate captain's journal is hidden in a cave on the island. You must locate and search it carefully.
The code to decipher the journal can be found in the governor's library. Your research will be crucial.

task.objective: Locate and claim the lost treasure.
task.description: After deciphering, follow the指示 in the journal to find the treasure on Treasure Island.
